Package reseau_petri

Class ArcPT

java.lang.Object
reseau_petri.Arc
reseau_petri.ArcPT
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyingArc, ZeroArc
public class ArcPT
extends Arc
Author:
IML An ArcPT inherits from Arc. It links a place to a transition (hence PT).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ArcPT​(Place place)
    This constructor builds an ArcPT linked to the place given in parameters.
    ArcPT​(Place place, int weight)
    This constructor builds an ArcPT linked to the place given in parameters.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean isPullable()
    This method returns a boolean defining whether or not the arc can be pulled.

    Methods inherited from class reseau_petri.Arc

    getPlace, getWeight

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ArcPT

      public ArcPT​(Place place)
      This constructor builds an ArcPT linked to the place given in parameters. Its default weight is 1.
      Parameters:
      place -

    • ArcPT

      public ArcPT​(Place place, int weight)
      This constructor builds an ArcPT linked to the place given in parameters. Its weight is also passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      place -
      weight -

  • Method Details

    • isPullable

      public boolean isPullable()
      This method returns a boolean defining whether or not the arc can be pulled. That is, if the weight of the ArcPT is smaller than (or equal to) the number of tokens contained in the linked place.
      Returns:
      isPullable
